  • java.lang.Object
    • EvtTagAlarmListener

  • public abstract class AlarmMonitor
extends EvtTagAlarmListener
    Abstract class for monitoring and handling tag alarms.

    Author:
    HMS Networks, MU Americas Solution Center

    • Method Detail

      • callTagChanged

        public void callTagChanged()
        Tag alarm event method. This method is invoked for each tag alarm that occurs.

      • onTagAlarm

        public abstract void onTagAlarm(java.lang.String alarmedTagName,
                                com.hms_networks.americas.sc.taginfo.TagType alarmedTagType,
                                java.lang.String alarmedTagValue,
                                java.lang.String alarmType,
                                java.lang.String alarmStatus,
                                java.lang.String alarmUtcTimestamp,
                                java.lang.String alarmLocalTimestamp)
        Abstract method to be implemented to handle tag alarms using the specified information.
        Parameters:
        alarmedTagName - alarmed tag name
        alarmedTagType - alarmed tag type
        alarmedTagValue - alarmed tag value
        alarmType - alarm type
        alarmStatus - alarm status
        alarmUtcTimestamp - alarm timestamp (UTC)
        alarmLocalTimestamp - alarm timestamp (local time)
